metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36411 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in libde265 v1.0.8 due to incorrect access control.A SEGV caused by a READ memory access in function derive_boundaryStrengthof deblock.cc has occurred. The vulnerability causes a segmentation faultand application crash, which leads to remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: libde265 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
